name: Pandemic (msttechblog)
description:
This is a game from a gdevelop template called Geometry Monster. I tried to make a game to earn money because I am retrenched recently due to the pandemic and I am finding it hard right now to land for a job since the competition is high and the situation is worse in this trying times. 

I was trying to make some monetization over creating simple apps but apparently google play console is not free and I don't have enough money to afford the registration. So sad and depressed right now. My debts are filing up, from credit card loans to my unpaid monthly rent.

Was expecting to earn even just a dollar to buy rice for this week. :( I hate this corona virus so much :(
